product_name: CamelBak Podium Arc 1 Hydration Waist Belt - 10 fl. oz. - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Taste the water, not the bottle, when you sip from the 10 fl. oz. bottle in the CamelBak Podium Arc 1 Hydration Waist Belt. Lightweight, easy-to-squeeze and BPA-free, the TruTaste(TM) polypropylene bottle with HydroGuard(TM) provides a natural water taste. Self-sealing Jet Valve(TM) eliminates splatters and spills; lockout prevents leaks. Waist pack has elastic webbing, mesh back panel, front and back reflectivity and an essentials pocket. CamelBak Podium Arc 1 Hydration Waist Belt is designed to hold your phone, energy bar, gel, cash and keys. Closeout.
short_description: Taste the water, not the bottle, when you sip from the 10 fl. oz. bottle in the CamelBak Podium Arc 1 Hydration Waist Belt.
